comments.body: I can’t recommend anybody to take drugs, addiction can cause devastating effects. Lots of people experiment with drugs when they’re young & if you are the type of person who is strong minded & can leave something after trying it a small number of times then why not, you are only young once.Addiction destroys lives & families though so if you’re not really strong mentally then I would advise against trying anything even once. Some of the greatest & most respected minds in history took class A drugs, like I said though I can’t advise you to do anything. A bit like one of the big rules in crypto, Do Your Own Research.
